mapper.select: select id, clue_no, clue_name, clue_time, judge_explain, classify_status, classify_time, jurisdictions, jurisdiction_cd, upload_time, upload_user, upload_person, update_time, update_user, update_person, clue_type, is_uploaded, problem_type, problem_desc, status_cd, visible_depts, canton_code, canton_name, clue_source, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time, version from ezview.case_clue_info where id = #{id}

select id, clue_no, clue_name, clue_time, judge_explain, classify_status, classify_time, jurisdictions, jurisdiction_cd, upload_time, upload_user, upload_person, update_time, update_user, update_person, clue_type, is_uploaded, problem_type, problem_desc, status_cd, visible_depts, canton_code, canton_name, clue_source, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time, version from ezview.case_clue_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into ezview.case_clue_info(clue_no, clue_name, clue_time, judge_explain, classify_status, classify_time, jurisdictions, jurisdiction_cd, upload_time, upload_user, upload_person, update_time, update_user, update_person, clue_type, is_uploaded, problem_type, problem_desc, status_cd, visible_depts, canton_code, canton_name, clue_source, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time, version) values (#{clueNo}, #{clueName}, #{clueTime}, #{judgeExplain}, #{classifyStatus}, #{classifyTime}, #{jurisdictions}, #{jurisdictionCd}, #{uploadTime}, #{uploadUser}, #{uploadPerson}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updatePerson}, #{clueType}, #{isUploaded}, #{problemType}, #{problemDesc}, #{statusCd}, #{visibleDepts}, #{cantonCode}, #{cantonName}, #{clueSource}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{version})
mapper.update:
update ezview.case_clue_info
clue_no = #{clueNo},
clue_name = #{clueName},
clue_time = #{clueTime},
judge_explain = #{judgeExplain},
classify_status = #{classifyStatus},
classify_time = #{classifyTime},
jurisdictions = #{jurisdictions},
jurisdiction_cd = #{jurisdictionCd},
upload_time = #{uploadTime},
upload_user = #{uploadUser},
upload_person = #{uploadPerson},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_person = #{updatePerson},
clue_type = #{clueType},
is_uploaded = #{isUploaded},
problem_type = #{problemType},
problem_desc = #{problemDesc},
status_cd = #{statusCd},
visible_depts = #{visibleDepts},
canton_code = #{cantonCode},
canton_name = #{cantonName},
clue_source = #{clueSource},
created_by = #{createdBy},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
version = #{version},
where id = #{id}
